thread.section_title: DriveTime Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DriveTime | www.drivetime.com | 2 of 447
thread.title: Ted

author: Ted
title: Ted
text: Do you have credit issues? Unless they're TERRIBLE, they don't even ask. They don't care about getting you in an AMAZING car, or the most EXPENSIVE car, they care about you getting something that you want and you'll actually be happy with. Steve worked well with me and was incredibly honest. He did everything he could to give me current and future advice about his company and the car I was buying. I am very satisfied with my experience. I will recommend anyone new to the car buying world to check this place out, you will be surprised for sure. Thanks Steve!
